artist: Designer: Frank Graham Holmes; Decorator: Schell Lewis; Manufacturer: Lenox
creditline: Gift of Christopher Monkhouse in honor of Judy and Kenneth Dayton and their support of architecture in the Twin Cities
description: short ovoid form with pair of handles, one attached to each short side; lid has copper luster bird for handle; one side of bowl decorated with image of Independence Hall; opposite side has eagle from U.S. Seal
markings: \'L[with 2 leaf fronds]/LENOX/Architects\' Tea Set/1933/copyright\', stamped in green, on bottom; \'2336[?]\', stamped, on bottom
medium: Porcelain with pink luster and black transfer decoration
object_name: Sugar Bowl, from Architects' Tea Set
title: Sugar Bowl, from Architects' Tea Set
